seo_keywords: Samsung Bespoke Jet clean station error
Samsung Bespoke Jet dust bag full

problems.title: Clean Station Red Light / Not Emptying
problems.description: The All-in-One Clean Station light turns red and won't empty the vacuum.
solution_steps: Replace the dust bag in the Clean Station (never reuse).
Check if the bottom flap of the vacuum dust bin opens freely.
Remove the dust bag and check the intake filter behind it.

required_parts.name: Bespoke Jet Clean Station Dust Bags

problems.title: Spinning Sweeper Not Turning
problems.description: The mop pads (Spinning Sweeper) stopped rotating.
possible_causes: Pads pressed too hard against floor
solution_steps: Lift the head off the floor and restart.
If they don't spin in the air, the motor attachment is faulty.
